com.receiver2d.engine.io

Class WorldResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.receiver2d.engine.io.R2DResource
      • com.receiver2d.engine.io.WorldResource

  • public class WorldResource
extends R2DResource
    A WorldResource is useful for loading worlds from world files.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.receiver2d.engine.io.R2DResource

        R2DW_MIMETYPE

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorldResource(String loc)
      Creates a new WorldResource from a given file location and loads this file into memory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      World getWorld()
      Parses the raw contents of the loaded world file into a scene graph.

      • Methods inherited from class com.receiver2d.engine.io.R2DResource

        getFile, getInputStream, getMimeType, getPath, load, setResource, setResource, unload

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorldResource

        public WorldResource(String loc)
        Creates a new WorldResource from a given file location and loads this file into memory. (note: R2DResource.load() is called automatically, but this is only done with the raw file contents; to load the file as a world, getWorld() must be called)
        Parameters:
        loc - The file location.

    • Method Detail

      • getWorld

        public World getWorld()
        Parses the raw contents of the loaded world file into a scene graph. This is done according to the standard JSON-like format of a R2D world file. The file must be in the proper JSON format, with a few specific exceptions, in order for effective parsing.
        Returns:
        A loaded world.
